Title: Establishes the everyone can play grant program
Summary: Establishes the everyone can play grant program which allows for grants up to $100,000 to municipalities to cover the costs for the creation of handicap accessible aspects in new or existing recreation facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง54, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the everyone can play grant program
